/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a vibrant urban landscape. A bus is captured in motion on the left side of the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape.
